pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Estimation in the Linear Random Coefficients Models // We implement adaptive estimation of the joint density linear model where the coefficients - intercept and slopes - are random and independent from regressors which support is a proper subset. The estimator proposed in Gaillac and Gautier (2019) arXiv:1905.06584 is based on Prolate Spheroidal Wave Functions which are computed efficiently in 'RandomCoefficients'. This package also provides a parallel implementation of the estimator.
